comments.content: It looks like a **[Gotham (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110754/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Gotham%20SSm%20-%20Bold&fid=9be53a0d3cd5c5ebece62231d1a0ad9c&fsize=60&text=Cerner&fit=1)** with modified |C| & |e|
